EnumCategory.Description: A binary operator can be used to evaluate an expression that takes 2 input expressions (Order of values in this file is used as order of precedence)

EnumItem.Description: A logical operation that returns true if either operand is true
EnumItem.Name: Or

EnumItem.Description: A logical operation that returns true if both operands must be true
EnumItem.Name: And

EnumItem.Description: An inequality comparison that returns true if the operands have different values
EnumItem.Name: NotEqual

EnumItem.Description: An equality comparison that returns true if both operands have the same value
EnumItem.Name: Equal

EnumItem.Description: A comparison that returns true if the left operand is greater than or equal to the right one
EnumItem.Name: GreaterThanOrEqual

EnumItem.Description: A comparison that returns true if the left operand is less than or equal to the right one
EnumItem.Name: LessThanOrEqual

EnumItem.Description: A comparison that returns true if the left operand is greater than the right one
EnumItem.Name: GreaterThan

EnumItem.Description: A comparison that returns true if the left operand is less than the right one
EnumItem.Name: LessThan

EnumCategory.Name: BinaryOperator
